original_title: Bret "Hit Man" Hart: His Greatest Matches
overview: Discover why Bret Hart was destined for excellence in this Home Video Classic highlighting some of The Hit Man's greatest battles! Mean Gene Okerlund takes the WWE Universe of journey through some exciting action featuring Bret Hart taking on the likes of Ric Flair, Lex Luger, Shawn Michaels, and many more!
title: Bret "Hit Man" Hart: His Greatest Matches
